name: Ghost Parade
summary: There’s something spooky in the woods... And it needs your help! Team up with 30 ghostly companions, each one lending a unique ability. Explore this spine-tingling scrolling action adventure and work together to get everyone safely home.
info:
• 发行: Aksys Games
  • 别名: 幽灵游行
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: AAVG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2019-10-31
  • 官方网站: http://www.aksysgames.com/ghostparade/
  • 开发: Lentera Nusantara
